name: Animals of Bering
description:
This is a demo, the game is still currently in development.

Animals of Bering is a 2D fantasy role playing game for PC with cartoon anthropomorphic characters where our two heroes, Fylek the sea otter and Casida the Siberian husky, must triumph and overcome the tyranny reining over the arctic themed kingdom known as Bering.

Traverse the lands of the Bering Kingdom inhabited by animals to stop the tyrant leading Prince Belachim for he has slain many citizens for exotic animal parts including Casida’s own kin, while also finding a cure for Fylek’s sick mother before she perishes in this classical top-down 2D Role Playing Game (RPG)!

  • Play as Fylek the Sea Otter and Casida the Siberian Husky simultaneously!
  • Explore areas from the smallest villages to the mightiest dungeons!
  • Meet a variety of subarctic animals across the kingdom as either friend or foe!
  • Recruit additional allies for your journey!
  • Battle with simple, but in-depth combat!
  • Find resources to craft a variety of your own equipment!
  • Spend Skill Points earned on level up to unlock unique techniques and magic!
  • Customize Fylek’s and Casida’s stat curves to play the way you want to play!

Currently not all listed features are accessible in the provided demo.

Game playable with keyboard, mouse, or controller.

Any equipment obtained in this game will be visually shown on the characters when equipped. 

The game can be played in English or German, however the latter is more proof of concept and has "all your base are belong to us" quality. If there is interest, I can see about getting quality languages outside English added.

NOTE: I do plan to eventually commission the character, enemy, and equipment art. I do not know when though.
